languages.text: "Периметр занят. Дальше — проверка контингента на лояльность".
"The perimeter is secure. The next step is to test the staff for loyalty."
languages.original_text: "Периметр занят. Дальше — проверка контингента на лояльность".

traits.locale_text: "The perimeter is secure. The next procedure is to test the population for loyalty."
"The perimeter is secure. The next procedure is to test the population for loyalty."
"The perimeter is secure. The next step is to test the population for loyalty."
"The perimeter is secure. The next step is to test the population for loyalty."
"The perimeter is secure. The next step is to test the staff for loyalty."
"The perimeter is secure. The next step is to test the staff for loyalty."

languages.text: "Der Perimeter ist sicher. Jetzt gilt es, die Loyalität des Personals zu testen."
languages.original_text: "The perimeter is secure. The next step is to test the staff for loyalty."

traits.locale_text: "Der Perimeter ist sicher. Jetzt gilt es, die Loyalität des Personals zu testen."

languages.text: « Le périmètre est sécurisé. À présent, il s'agit de mettre à l'épreuve la loyauté des employés. »
languages.original_text: "The perimeter is secure. The next step is to test the staff for loyalty."

traits.locale_text: « Le périmètre est sécurisé. À présent, il s'agit de mettre à l'épreuve la loyauté des employés. »

languages.text: 「周囲の警戒は確保されました。次のステップは、職員の忠誠心を試すことです」
languages.original_text: "The perimeter is secure. The next step is to test the staff for loyalty."

traits.locale_text: 「周囲の警戒は確保されました。次のステップは、職員の忠誠心を試すことです」

languages.text: «El perímetro es seguro. El siguiente paso es comprobar la lealtad del personal».
languages.original_text: "The perimeter is secure. The next step is to test the staff for loyalty."

traits.locale_text: «El perímetro es seguro. El siguiente paso es comprobar la lealtad del personal».

languages.text: “周边区域安全，接下来要测试战斗人员的忠诚程度。”
languages.original_text: "The perimeter is secure. The next step is to test the staff for loyalty."

traits.locale_text: “周边区域安全，接下来要测试战斗人员的忠诚程度。”

languages.text: "Bölge güvenli. Sıradaki adım, personelin sadakatini sınamak olacak."
languages.original_text: "The perimeter is secure. The next step is to test the staff for loyalty."

traits.locale_text: "Bölge güvenli. Sıradaki adım, personelin sadakatini sınamak olacak."
